synopsis.text: Dai-Nazo Ningen, the Infinite Mystery Girl, better known as Miyo Sasaki, is a vivacious middle school student with an insatiable crush on her classmate Kento Hinode. Despite her daily advances, Kento remains uninterested in her affections. However, Miyo stumbles upon a magical solution to her unrequited love: a spell that transforms her into a cat. As a feline, she captures Kento's attention and enjoys the closeness she yearns for. But as the boundaries between her human and cat forms begin to blur, Miyo faces a heart-wrenching dilemma. Will she choose to remain a cat to stay close to Kento, or will she return to her human form and risk losing him forever? Join Miyo on her fantastical journey of self-discovery and love, as seen through the eyes of a cat.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
